basicInfo.name: Pepe
basicInfo.flavor: Pepe's determination to defend the forest from the constant Goblin attacks was so great that it turned him gold.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Bounce
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 245% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 85% chance to inflict Stun. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 245% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Kingly Stockpile
Skill 2.desc:
All Allies
 - Heals HP equal to 70% of the caster's Defense.

Passive.name: Cell Division
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Revives with 60% HP upon falling in battle. [Once per Battle]

profile.story:
Pepe is the peace-loving king of the slimes.
Initially, Pepe was very timid and easily scared.
One day, while meandering around the Mystic Tree, he discovered a crudely made golden crown on the ground and thought it was awesome.
It was a toy crown made of fake gold, of course, but Pepe didn't have the intellect to tell it apart from a real one. He put on the crown with glee.
When the other slimes saw the crown on his head, they all began to treat him as their new king. Soon, even monsters from other species like the Pooki and Ahri began to see Pepe as their king as well.
And so the slime Pepe eventually grew into his role as king.
Lately, being a king has come with all sorts of worries.
He felt an acute sense of duty to protect his subjects and friends from the constant goblin raids.
Thus, Pepe came to join forces with his friends and fight against the goblins.
Now, while Rudy rules over the humans and elves in the Mystic Woods, Pepe has become the lord over the monsters residing in the Mystic Woods.

basicInfo.name: Pepe
basicInfo.flavor: With time, King Pepe matured as the king of slimes. However, his hate for confrontation has been making the invasion of goblins a big concern.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Bounce
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 220% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 220% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Kingly Stockpile
Skill 2.desc:
All Allies
 - Heals HP equal to 65% of the caster's Defense.

Passive.name: Cell Division
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Revives with 45% HP upon falling in battle. [Once per Battle]

basicInfo.name: Pepe
basicInfo.flavor: Pepe is the king of the slimes, and protects the center of the Mystic Woods. He hates confrontations, and there are rumors that his crown is an imitation.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Bounce
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 200% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 200% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Kingly Stockpile
Skill 2.desc:
All Allies
 - Heals HP equal to 60% of the caster's Defense.

Passive.name: Cell Division
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Revives with 30% HP upon falling in battle. [Once per Battle]
